challenge: Deep AR came to us with a industry knowlege, a unique vision, and a goal of having a working demo in time to impress potential investors and clients at a large industry event
solution: We knew that we needed toc reate more than a 'tech demo' to impress potential investors, and get the industry to take notice. We delivered a demo app with a clean polished UI, and a simulated reality mode which puts the user out in the field - wherever they are.
